instruction: Chop onion and green bell pepper.
Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
Saut√© onion and green bell pepper until softened.
Add minced garlic, chili powder, cumin, coriander, smoked paprika, and oregano. Cook for 30 seconds, stirring constantly.
Add diced tomatoes, kidney beans, black beans, corn, and vegetable broth to the pot.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low and simmer for at least 30 minutes, or up to 2 hours.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve hot, topped with your favorite chili toppings such as shredded cheese, avocado, sour cream, or green onions.
